card.name: Feast
card.description: Give a monster -2/-2. {{KW:DELAY}}: If it is still alive, give all ally monsters +1/+1.

description.now: Give a monster -2/-2. {{KW:DELAY}}: If it is still alive, give all ally monsters +1/+1.
description.prev: Fully heal all damaged ally monsters. Give undamaged ally monsters +1/+1.
